Articles.Content: Is there any way to read the part.cfg of the current part?

Is there any way to read the part.cfg of the current part?

part.cfg sets public fields, so if you have the following in part.cfg:


Explodium = true

Then the field Explodium is set to true.

Unfortunately, my parts have things that can\'t be described by these variables alone. That\'s why I use additional parser. The current solution is copying the cfg to plugin data folder, but it would be good to have access (at least read only) to the folder of the part.
